remarks: Axiom of segment construction, Axiom A4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 11. As discussed in Axiom 4 of [Tarski1999] p. 178, "The intuitive content [is that] given any line segment ` A B ` , one can construct a line segment congruent to it, starting at any point ` Y ` and going in the direction of any ray containing ` Y ` .  The ray is determined by the point ` Y ` and a second point ` X ` , the endpoint of the ray. The other endpoint of the line segment to be constructed is just the point ` z ` whose existence is asserted." (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
